props.disabled: Removes the ability to click or target the component.
props.hover: Will apply an elevation of 4dp when hovered (default 2dp). You can find more information on the [elevation page](/blazor/styles-and-animations/elevation).
props.img: Specifies an image background for the card. For more advanced implementations, it is recommended that you use the [MImage](/blazor/components/images) component. You can find a v-img example here.
props.loaderHeight: Specifies the height of the loader.
props.loading: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - **primary**, **secondary**, **success**, **info**, **warning**, **error**) or a Boolean which uses the component `Color` (set by color prop - if it’s supported by the component) or the primary color
props.outlined: Removes elevation (box-shadow) and adds a thin border.
props.raised: Specifies a higher default elevation (8dp). You can find more information on the [elevation page](/blazor/styles-and-animations/elevation).

contents.progressContent: Slot for custom progress linear (displayed when `Loading` prop is not equal to Boolean False)
